question: How can we analyze the recent trends in technology adoption among companies in the healthcare industry?

subtasks.task: Identify healthcare companies and their core financial metrics to understand their size and market presence.
Gather information on the technology stack used by these healthcare companies to identify common tools and platforms being adopted.
Analyze the strategic technology focus areas of the identified healthcare companies to understand their priorities in technology adoption.
Review vendor contracts and partnerships within the healthcare sector to analyze vendor relationships related to technology services.
Examine industry-specific technology trends that may be impacting the healthcare sector by referencing emerging IT trends from the IndustryITTrend table.
